snippet: Libraries from Maine to California are recasting themselves as hands-on creative hubs where people can learn crafts and experiment with technology like 3-D printers.
abstract: Libraries are taking part in cultural shift by seeing themselves as hands-on creative hubs, where people can learn crafts and new technology and even check out everyday items like sewing machines; Sacramento Public Library's Library of Things is one of several dozen in country which embraces 'maker movement.'
lead_paragraph: Libraries from Maine to California are recasting themselves as hands-on creative hubs where people can learn crafts and experiment with technology like 3-D printers.

headline.main: These Public Libraries Are for Snowshoes and Ukuleles
headline.print_headline: These Libraries Are for Snowshoes and Ukuleles
